gr/

brim.pro


Image browser.

brim may be run standalone or from within grim. If no files or data descriptors are given, brim first prompts the user to select a list of files. brim then displays thumbnails of all valid files. Files may be selected by clicking with the left mouse button. By default, the image is opened in a new grim window. Alternate actions may be defined through procedures supplied by the caller. EXAMPLES: To load files into brim using a file-selection widget: IDL> brim To load all recognizeable images in the current directory into brim: IDL> brim, '*' To browse a set of data descriptors: IDL> dd = dat_read('*') IDL> brim, dd STATUS: Complete.

Author information

History

Written by: Spitale, 10/2002
